catalog_info.title: Early-Stage Research and Discussions on Economic Development
catalog_info.notes: Primarily, but not exclusively, for doctoral students in economics who have passed their oral examinations.
catalog_info.description: Participants discuss recent research in economic development and present their own work in progress. Popularly known as the Development Tea. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
